summary: The diff shows implementation of logo display in Hero.tsx, but the logo image file generation (REQ-55) is not evidenced in the diff. The Hero component was successfully modified to display the logo with responsive sizing and proper positioning above the headline.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate the Rajat's Equation logo image from the uploaded file (rajat's eqn logo -1.jpeg) and save it to frontend/public/assets/generated/ as a static asset with appropriate dimensions
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff of logo file generation or addition. The diff shows 'Added: 0' files, meaning the logo image file was not added to frontend/public/assets/generated/. The Hero component references the logo path, but the actual image file creation is not shown.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx references '/assets/generated/rajats-equation-logo.dim_250x200.png' but file addition not shown
